post:
**NyaVM - Do not missing the cheapest VPS in California.**

Enterprise Hardware, Skilled Staff, Budget Prices is our philosophy.
Packages

Prices listed are in USD, PayPal and Alipay are available with no extra transaction fee. Monthly and yearly billing are available. 

Yearly billing only costs you 10 months' price. 

Multiple OS are available for installation, including Ubuntu 12.04/14.04/16.04, CentOS 5/6/7, Debian 6/7/8 and Fedora 17/18/20/23 (all are 64bit version). 

Prices listed here are discounted price. Please use **_USAVPS_** to get lifetime 70% OFF.

## Features Include

* Directly peer with CN2, Level3, TATA, He, China Unicom, Telia, GTT 
* Powerful Intel Xeon CPU
* KVM Full Virtualisation
* 1Gbps Port

## DIY Package (USA)
* 1 vCore
* 1 GiB Dedicated RAM (DDR4)
* 20GB RAID10 HDD
* 1 IPv4 Address
* 1 Gbps Port
* Free 3 TiB Data Transfer
* Unmanaged server
* Prorata Billing (Every month 1st)
* $4.5/Month
* PTR Available!
* You can decide the rest of the ingredients!

Available in San Jose and Los Angeles [Order Here](https://my.nyavm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=45)

https://my.nyavm.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=45

##Available KVM Operating Systems

* CentOS 5/6/7
* Debian 6/7/8
* Ubuntu 12/14/16
* Fedora 17/18/20/23

## Looking Glass

SJC: http://c3-sjc.lg.nyavm.com/
LA: http://c3-lax.lg.nyavm.com/


## QnA

* What's the time required for delivering?

Usually within 300 seconds after payment is received. If your service is still pending after 300 seconds, you may contact us via Tickets.

* Do you support Paypal Automatically Payment?

No, we don't.

* What applications or services are prohibited to run on your server?

Please refer to our ToS.

* Do you have other smaller/bigger packages?

There are no smaller packages available. Bigger packages are available and you may submit a ticket after you place an order (don't pay first) and tell us how much resource you need. We can calculate the cost for you. Of course, Life Time 70% off also applies to customized USA servers.
